title: Interview: Comedian Mo Amer on the Refugee Experience, #MeToo And Touring The World
description: Mo Amer joins Sam to talk about his experience emigrating from Kuwait to Houston and the almost-constant code-switching he did growing up. He also shares his thoughts about #MeToo in the comedy world. This episode contains explicit discussion about sexual issues pertaining to the #MeToo movement.

itunes:summary: Amer is the star of the recent Netflix special, 'Mo Amer: The Vagabond.'
